message: I hear a sound coming from the stairs.
But I don't have any time to consider what it might be.
The door suddenly swings open and Koujaku bursts in.

name: 紅雀
message: "I sent you a message, didn't I? But forget about that! Get your hands off Aoba, asshole!"
Koujaku growls and grabs the blond guy.
They tumble to the floor, grappling.
My arm is free, but it doesn't really matter anymore.
They're tumbling all over the place. I couldn't stop them if I tried.
The man dodges one of Koujaku's attacks, then uses the break in Koujaku's guard to grab his shoulders and attempt to knee him in the stomach.
Koujaku blocks the blow with his arms and responds with a headbutt.
It slows him down, but he immediately fires another knee at Koujaku's stomach.
Koujaku pulls back at just the right moment. The other guy's knee just grazes the hem of his kimono.
Koujaku pulls back his fist. He's clearly at the end of his rope.
...Then there's a noise at the window.
